notes: Used in OPERATION mode to set DC motor speed and steering servo angle (8-bit).

name: ENTER_IDLE
robot_response: Not enough data to confirm (not required for control).
notes: Puts the robot into IDLE: motor stopped, steering held at safe/center position.

name: REQUEST_LINE_FRAME
notes: Requests one line-sensor frame. Robot replies with ACK 0x20 and 5×uint8 values.
